model

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plant, Zombie

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that contains all entities within the game (Plants and Zombies)
    Version:
    Nov 16, 2018
    Author:
    Simon Krol

      • Entity

                 int att,
                 int def,
                 double attSp,
                 Lane lane)
        Entity constructor
        Parameters:
        maxHP - Entities maximum health
        lane - The lane the entity is in
        att - The entities attack damage
        def - The entities defence, currently unused
        attSp - The entities attack speed
